devdoc.details: Implements both AggregatorV3Interface and IPriceFeedLegacy for backwards compatibilityThis contract is optimized for gas efficiency by only supporting upscaling operations

params._sourceFeed: Address of the source Chainlink price feed
params._targetDecimals: Target decimal precision (must be greater than source decimals)

params._roundId: The round ID to retrieve data for

returns.answeredInRound: The round in which the answer was computed
returns.startedAt: The timestamp when the round started
returns.updatedAt: The timestamp when the round was updated

returns._0: latestAnswer The latest successfully reported value with target decimals
latestRound The number of the latest update round

returns.answeredInRound: The round in which the answer was computed
returns.startedAt: The timestamp when the round started
returns.updatedAt: The timestamp when the round was updated

devdoc.title: ChainlinkDecimalUpscaler

InvalidDecimalsDownscaleNotSupported().notice: Error thrown when target decimals are less than or equal to source decimals

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize the upscaling decimal converter

description().notice: Returns the description of the original feed

getRoundData(uint80).notice: Gets data for a specific round

latestAnswer().notice: Legacy function: Gets the latest successfully reported value with adjusted decimals

latestRound().notice: Legacy function: Gets the number of latest round

latestRoundData().notice: Gets data for the latest round

sourceDecimals().notice: Original decimals from the source feed

version().notice: Returns the version of the original feed

userdoc.notice: Dedicated upscaler for Chainlink price feeds - increases decimal precision
